title: Quarkus with `./mvnw -Dquickly` fails to build if Gradle v8 is on the PATH
body:
### Describe the bug

Build scan available here: https://scans.gradle.com/s/lyux2bbbec3lw

Output is:
```sh
[INFO] --- exec-maven-plugin:3.0.0:exec (gradle) @ quarkus-gradle-model ---

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* Where:
Build file '/home/user/projects/quarkus/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/build.gradle' line: 31

* What went wrong:
A problem occurred evaluating project ':gradle-application-plugin'.
> Could not find method pluginBundle() for arguments [build_b99wqafydb9e21buibwwi9a2j$_run_closure3@267a8777] on project ':gradle-application-plugin' of type org.gradle.api.Project.

* Try:
> Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output.

* Exception is:
org.gradle.api.GradleScriptException: A problem occurred evaluating project ':gradle-application-plugin'.
        at org.gradle.groovy.scripts.internal.DefaultScriptRunnerFactory$ScriptRunnerImpl.run(DefaultScriptRunnerFactory.java:93)
```


### Expected behavior

I'm not familiar with building Gradle projects from Maven modules, but using `gradlew` wrapper and specifying Gradle 7.x may work

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
